document.text: Typically , the lexicon models used in statistical machine translation systems do not include any kind of linguistic or contextual information , which often leads to problems in performing a correct word sense disambiguation .
One way to deal with this problem within the statistical framework is to use maximum entropy methods .
In this paper , we present how to use this type of information within a statistical machine translation system .
